details: This type of gym equipment is best used for bodybuilders and powerlifters as it’s not that transferable in other areas of fitness.
Anyone wanting to better their cardiovascular fitness. They can be beneficial for sprinters and long-distance runners. so its very help-full
name: TREADMILL

details: This dip station grows and builds strength within your triceps. Athletes such as rowers, baseball players, powerlifters, and bodybuilders should use this.
name: chest fly machine

details: Again, this is not a functional fitness exercise, so mainly the incline bench is beneficial for bodybuilders or those who are wanting to add to their aesthetic.

details: Leg press is a resistance-based activity that is good for building muscle. If you’re a bodybuilder or powerlifter, then you should use this machine to build muscle.

details: If you do yoga, pilates, you’re a swimmer or cyclist this machine will help strengthen your back muscles.so thats why its so help-full
